job.title: Frontend Developer
job.description:
ShortList Recruitment are working with a Nationwide Real Estate company in the Austin area who are looking to bring in a Software Engineer to help their continued growth. This developer would get the ability to enhance their current platform by adapting existing features and creating new ones to solve technical issues.

 

Tasks

  • Work effectively with a team of 8 other Backend/Frontend Developers and QA's to build an amazing software product
  • Build software primarily using ReactJS (or Angular)
  • Work and communicate effectively in a team environment
  • Thoughtful in code reviews with the ability to contribute and the desire to learn


Desired Skills and Experience

  • 5+ years of software development experience
  • Experience with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and object-oriented programming languages
  • Experience with ReactJS, or AngularJS is required
  • Experience with RESTful APIs
  • Experience with Unit Testing is a plus
  • Experience with Azure Cloud is a plus

 

This position would be paying a Competitive Salary plus a fantastic benefits package. The ideal candidate is located in Austin, TX.
